name: mycred-gb-blocks/mycred-users-of-rank
title: Users of Rank
description: A block to display a list of users for a specific rank.

rank_id.description: The rank to list users for.

login.description: Message to show for logged out users.

number.description: The number of users to display. Use -1 for all users of the rank.

wrap.description: The HTML element to wrap each row of users. Defaults to 1 (div).

col.description: The number of columns to use when wrapping users in a table.

nothing.default: No users found with this rank
nothing.description: Message to display when no users are found for the rank.

order.description: Order of the users, either ascending or descending based on balance.

ctype.description: The point type to filter users by.
